termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsAndConditions.generalTermsDescription: These terms and conditions (incorporating RewardClub Privacy Policy) (“Terms”) apply to and govern your participation in the RewardClub loyalty programme.
termsAndConditions.rewardClubDescription: RewardClub is a single-purpose store value facility operated by RewardClub and its affiliated companies (“RewardClub”, “us”, “we”, “our”).
termsAndConditions.amendmentTerms: These Terms may be amended by RewardClub from time to time, and continued participation constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
termsAndConditions.lawsDescription: Your use of the Programme is subject to all applicable laws.
termsAndConditions.privacyDescription: Under data protection laws, we are required to provide details on how we process your personal data.
termsAndConditions.privacyPolicyLink: Please refer to RewardClub Privacy Policy for more information.
termsAndConditions.eligibilityCondition1: Any resident or national of a country where RewardClub operates may join RewardClub free of charge.
termsAndConditions.eligibilityCondition2: Enrollment requires downloading the RewardClub app and completing the registration form.
termsAndConditions.eligibilityCondition3: RewardClub membership requires providing accurate and complete information.
termsAndConditions.accountResponsibility1: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
termsAndConditions.accountResponsibility2: Only one unique mobile number can be associated with each individual account.
termsAndConditions.accountResponsibility3: RewardClub is not liable for unauthorized account usage.
termsAndConditions.earningPoints: Points can be earned at participating RewardClub outlets and websites.
termsAndConditions.redeemingPoints: Points must be presented at the time of purchase.
termsAndConditions.retroactiveClaims: Retroactive point claims can be made within 30 days of the transaction.

retroactive_claims.title: 6. Retroactive Claims
points: Members can claim missing points within 30 days by contacting customer service.
Valid points will be credited within 48 hours after verification.
Purchases made before joining RewardClub are not eligible for retroactive claims.

points_accrual.title: 7. Points Accrual & Redemption
points: RewardClub Points can be collected and redeemed as per the programme's rules.
Points are based on the total transaction value, including VAT.
Partial points are not awarded; amounts are rounded down.

Earning Points: Members can earn Points for a transaction at any of the RewardClub stores and online sites, showing the RewardClub logo (“Outlets”). You should ask for a receipt at the time you make a qualifying purchase transaction and retain the receipt as a record of the transaction. Points will not be awarded when purchasing medicines at Boots participating stores and RewardClub gift cards.
Points will be accrued only for the transaction value paid with cash or card including RewardClub gift cards. If part of the transaction is paid with Points it will not accrue points.

Redeeming Points: members can redeem Points by utilising accrued points to pay or offset the price for purchases and services in participating outlets; or redeemed in exchange for rewards in the RewardClub MENA app or www.RewardClub-mena.com as updated by RewardClub from time to time. In order to perform any type of point redemption at least one sale transaction must be recorded on a member’s account.
points_accrual.details: In the event that for any reason a refund or credit note is issued by RewardClub following the return of any qualifying purchase, any earned Point(s) in respect of such purchase shall be deducted from the relevant Member’s Programme account. In addition to the above, if a customer purchases a product using RewardClub points and he or she decides to exchange or return that product within the permitted fourteen (14) days period following the purchase, in the event that the points used for the purchase are expired at the time of exchange/refund, RewardClub reserves the right not to reinstate such points and the customer shall pay the corresponding additional amount (by cash, card or points).

points_visible.title: 8. Points will be visible on a member’s account after 24 hours of the transaction instore, or after delivery for Ecommerce purchases.
points_visible.details: Points and/or rewards have no cash value, cannot be redeemed for cash and are void if sold, purchased, bartered, or exchanged for cash or other consideration, or if received or used in violation of these Terms. No change/currency will be given for any unused portion of any Point or Programme reward.

point_expiry.title: 9. Point expiry period
points: Base points are valid for 12 months from the date they are earned. Your Points expire at midnight, on the last day of the relevant month.
Bonus points are valid for 3 months from the date they are earned. Your Points expire at midnight, on the last day of the relevant month.

Base points means the basic points that member earns after completing a valid sales transaction in any of the RewardClub participating brands; base points calculation is listed in the table under ‘Earning Your Points with RewardClub’, clause number seven in the T&Cs of this programme.

Earning Points: Members can earn Points for a transaction at any of the RewardClub stores and online sites, showing the RewardClub logo (“Outlets”). You should ask for a receipt at the time you make a qualifying purchase transaction and retain the receipt as a record of the transaction. Points will not be awarded when purchasing medicines at Boots participating stores and RewardClub gift cards.

tier_rules.title: 10. Tier General rules
tier_rules.subtitle: RewardClub has 3 tiers: RewardClub Hello, RewardClub Star, RewardClub VIP
points: Hello: for Members with between 1 to 5,999 tier earned points
Star: for Members with between 6,000 to 23,999 tier earned points
VIP: for holders Members with between 24,000 or more tier earned points
Tier Points are calculated based on eligible spend only in participating RewardClub stores. Tier qualification is available for fully enrolled customers only
Members qualify for Tiers based on their cumulative spend in the last 12 months
In order to be upgraded to the next Tier, a Member must reach a certain points threshold, as detailed above, within a 12-month period

If a member upgrades any time during the 12month period, the new tier will apply for 12 months from the date of upgrade, unless another tier is reached, in which case, this new tier will again apply for 12 months from the date of such upgrade
Tier points are only calculated on purchases; no bonus points will apply in calculating Tiers

In case a Member does not reach the renewal qualification threshold within the 12-month period, a member will be downgraded: From RewardClub VIP to RewardClub Star; From RewardClub Star to RewardClub Hello

credits_account_creation: 11. Credit account creation, eligibility, and access
credits_use_1: Members can use credit facilities to store refunds from eligible purchases processed at participating RewardClub stores in the UAE using the local currency, the UAE Dirham.
credits_use_2: Only fully registered members of RewardClub can use credit facilities in the app. To register for RewardClub, simply download the RewardClub MENA app from the App Store or Google Play, complete the registration process, and obtain your membership number.
credits_use_3: To access credit balances, members must log into their personal accounts. Access to view is restricted to each member to access their own account and cannot be shared with friends or family listed in the same account.
credits_use_4: Funds added to the credit facilities via refunds remain valid for twelve (12) months from the date of addition. Any unused funds after this period will expire and cannot be redeemed.
credits_use_5: Members' balances in the RewardClub wallet cannot be withdrawn as cash, converted into another form of credit, or transferred to any other RewardClub account.
credits_use_6: The maximum total amount allowed in credit facilities at any time is AED 50,000.
credits_use_7: Cash stored in credit facilities by a member can be used for purchases at certain participating RewardClub stores.
friends_and_family_description: RewardClub provides friends and family accounts that allow a group of members to accumulate points under a shared balance and use friends and family points for redemption on purchases and rewards.
general_friends_and_family_rules: General rules for friends and family
friends_and_family_rule_2: Maximum number of members: 8 (including the head of friends and family)
friends_and_family_rule_3: A member can only be part of one friends and family group at a time.
friends_and_family_rule_4: Age restrictions: The head of the friends and family group must be of legal age in the region where they are enrolled in the program.
friends_and_family_rule_5: Membership: The head of the friends and family group can add or remove members.
friends_and_family_rule_6: Redemption: Each member in friends and family is eligible to redeem accumulated points from the group.
friends_and_family_rule_7: Leaving the friends and family group: When a member leaves the group, the points earned during their time in the group remain in the friends and family account.
friends_and_family_rule_8: If the maximum number of members (8) is reached, when a member leaves, a 90-day waiting period is enforced before a new invite can be sent.
child_enrolment_1: By participating in the program, you agree to comply with these terms, and you represent and warrant that you are either (a) of legal age in the region where you are enrolling in the program and legally capable of accepting these terms; or (b) if under the legal age, you have obtained permission from a parent or legal guardian to participate in the program and that your use of the program and its features will be under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian.
child_enrolment_2: As a parent or guardian, the head of a friends and family group (who is over the legal age in the region where they are enrolled) can invite members of any age, including children aged 13 to 17.
child_enrolment_3: By adding children in this age category, you expressly agree that these minors may receive marketing communications from RewardClub via electronic or other means.
child_enrolment_4: By adding members, the head of the friends and family group can grant the right to redeem points accumulated by each member by any of the other members.
co_brand_card_1: The following terms apply to RewardClub members who are holders of the NBK & Weyay-RewardClub co-branded card ("NBK Card"), which is available only in Kuwait (for residents in Kuwait with a valid residency in the country).
co_brand_card_3: Members can earn RewardClub points through the use of the NBK & Weyay-RewardClub cards as outlined in the table below.
co_brand_card_4: Co-branded card points earned can be forfeited when redeeming partially or fully purchased goods.
employees_1: Employees of RewardClub and its affiliates can join the program and benefit from exclusive offers and news.
digital_card_restriction: 17. The RewardClub digital card cannot be used as a gift card, credit card, debit card, or as collateral for payment.
benefits_restriction: 18. Benefits from RewardClub only apply to purchases made in participating stores, excluding all 'business-to-business' sales from RewardClub.
rewardclub_rights: 19. RewardClub may close the RewardClub program or offer or withdraw any offer at any time without prior notice, subject to applicable laws and regulations.
personal_data_privacy: 20. Your personal data will be used only as described in RewardClub’s privacy policy.
discrepancy_in_text: 21. This document is in both Arabic and English. In case of any discrepancy between the Arabic and English texts, the Arabic text will prevail.
jurisdiction: 22. These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where you have enrolled in the RewardClub program.
jurisdiction_text_1: All members irrevocably agree to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the relevant jurisdiction for the purpose of taking any legal action arising from or related to these terms.
jurisdiction_text_2: If any provision of these terms and conditions is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, that provision will be deemed void.
